raw_code:
var dem = ee.Image('USGS/SRTMGL1_003');
Map.addLayer(dem, {min: 0, max: 3000}, 'SRTM DEM');
processing step: Load the SRTM DEM image from the USGS/SRTMGL1_003 dataset
Add the DEM layer to the map with a specified min and max value for visualization
output: SRTM DEM visualization on the map
